attributes.action: Vigorously support the incineration of household waste
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Objections to incinerator emissions from household waste (not hazardous waste)are based on gut feelings not supported by scientific fact.  Waste incinerators are known to produce fewer stack emissions than many industrial chimneys (checkable on the Env Agency website), and are one of the cleanest and most sustainable methods of disposing of non-recyclable household waste.  When combined with district heating systems (e.g. Sheffiled, Nottingham)the environmental benefits are significant.
